Olive Garlic Parmesan Marinated Mushrooms

This marinated mushroom recipe is the perfect appetizer or side for any occasion. Enjoy the delicious flavor and texture of these mushrooms marinated in olive oil, parmesan, garlic, and herbs!

by Christina Cherrier – Updated Jun 18, 202312 servingsPrep: 10 MinCook: 0 Min
Send to a friend

By Christina Cherrier

Share this post Save on Pinterest Share on Facebook Print Send to a friend Reviews
New: Meal Planner Plan your weekly meals instantly from anywhere on the web Try the Meal Planner!

Garlic Parmesan Marinated Mushrooms – This delicious recipe for marinated mushrooms with parmesan and garlic is the perfect appetizer or side dish for any occasion. The mushrooms are marinated in olive oil, parmesan cheese, fresh garlic, pepper, and herbs for maximum flavor and texture. Serve the marinated mushrooms at your next get-together or dinner party, and you’ll have everyone’s taste buds singing! Whether you’re a fan of mushroom recipes or need a new appetizer, this is a guaranteed crowd-pleaser!

Photo credit: © Eatwell101.com

Ingredients list for the marinated mushrooms recipe

  • 1 lb (450g) mushrooms, sliced
  • 1/3 cup grated parmesan
  • 4 clove garlic, minced
  • 1/2 teaspoon black pepper
  • 2 tablespoons chopped parsley
  • 1/2 cup olive oil

Photo credit: © Eatwell101.com

Photo credit: © Eatwell101.com

Photo credit: © Eatwell101.com

Photo credit: © Eatwell101.com

Photo credit: © Eatwell101.com

Photo credit: © Eatwell101.com

Directions

1. To make the garlic parmesan marinated mushrooms: In a small bowl, combine minced garlic, grated parmesan, chopped parsley, and olive oil.

2. Arrange the sliced mushrooms on a large shallow plate, and pour the olive oil-parmesan mixture on top. Toss gently to coat the mushrooms and marinate for at least 30 minutes.

3. Serve the parmesan mushroom dip with toasted bread, crackers, tortilla chips, or pita chips. Enjoy! ❤️

Photo credit: © Eatwell101.com
